titleStmt.title: The baptizing of the eunuch in three sermons vpon Act. 8. 36. 37. 38. By Samuel Hieron.
titleStmt.author: Hieron, Samuel, 1576?-1617.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Melch. Bradvvood for Samuel Macham, and are to be solde at his shop in Pauls church-yard at the signe of the Bull-head,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
